title: Stanislav Sorokin (footballer)
text:
Stanislav Yuriyovych Sorokin (; born 3 May 2000) is a <a href="professional">professional</a> <a href="Ukraine">Ukrainian</a> <a href="football%20%28association%29">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a> who plays for <a href="FC%20Kolos%20Kovalivka">Kolos Kovalivka</a>.
Career.
Sorokin is a product of the FC Dynamo Kyiv Youth Sportive School system and competed for this team in the <a href="Ukrainian%20Youth%20Football%20League">Ukrainian Youth Football League</a>.
In July 2019 he joined the newly promoted <a href="Ukrainian%20Premier%20League">Ukrainian Premier League</a> side <a href="FC%20Kolos%20Kovalivka">FC Kolos Kovalivka</a> and made his debut for its in the away losing match against <a href="FC%20Oleksandriya">FC Oleksandriya</a> on 14 March 2020 in the <a href="Ukrainian%20Premier%20League">Ukrainian Premier League</a> as a main-squad player.
